publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook, assignee of Benjamin Tooke, printer to the King and Queens Most Excellent Majesties; and are to sold on Ormonde-Key,

notesStmt.note: "Given at their Majesties castle of Dublin the seventh day of October, 1690.".
For the arrest of private soldiers without passes.--Steele.
Steele notation: Arms 201. Soul- are others.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
